medical_history.chief_complaint: Elevated resting creatine kinase levels and rapid exhaustion after intensive exercise.
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: The symptoms of elevated creatine kinase levels and exhaustion began with the patient's exercise, indicating a progressive development that warranted investigation.
medical_history.past_medical_history: The patient has a family history of malignant hyperthermia, with her mother being diagnosed as MH-susceptible, and a confirmation of the same condition was performed before her surgical procedure.
medical_history.family_history: Family members, including the mother, were diagnosed with malignant hyperthermia; both grandparents tested MH-negative.
